comment: The sandbox global object is not the window itself, so all global variables need to be manually attached to the window.
Replace chrome URIs with remote URLs to be bootstrapped. The string '%path%' will be replaced with the bootstrap path.
Replace loadSubScript() with a remote subscript loader.
